name: AyatAlkursi
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: read rukyah
des: This skill streams the reading of Ayat Akursi by Shaikh Alafasy in one the official reading styles of the holy Quran. To start it just say OPEN READ RUKYAH. As no official voice translation of the holy scripture exists, it is played in the Arabic language with no translation. This link offers a written translation of the verses. https://www.quran411.com/ayatul-kursi
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
